settings.title: fran√ßais
settings.heading: Du made in France... enfin !
settings.content:
Nous sommes les premiers √† proposer de l'encens fran√ßais ! Un peu de chauvinisme √ßa fait pas de mal, non ?

Tous nos b√¢tonnets d'encens sont fabriqu√©s dans notre atelier au coeur des Pyren√©es, √† Tarbes.

Cerise sur le g√¢teau, le packaging est √©galement europ√©en !

settings.title: naturel
settings.heading: 100% naturel.
settings.content:
Un mot d'ordre ; la transparence.

Pas d'intitul√© mystique ou de composition opaque chez Bloom ; nous utilisons des mati√®res 100% naturelles tri√©es sur le volet.

Du bois, des huiles essentielles, des √©pices, de la r√©sine... et c'est tout !

Ah non, un peu d'eau aussi...

settings.title: artisanal
settings.heading: Un savoir faire unique.
settings.content:
Nous fabriquons nos encens √† la main de fa√ßon artisanale et contr√¥lons l'int√©gralit√© du processus de production. Comme √ßa, pas de surprise !

Venez d√©couvrir notre atelier et cr√©er vos propres encens avec nous. La porte est toujours grande ouverte !

settings.title: Le cadeau parfait pour (se) faire plaisir ! üéÅ
Hello, that Bloom?
settings.content: Say hello to the first incense made in France, 100% natural and handmade! Far from traditional incense while maintaining an artisanal process, we have created a greener, healthier and more subtle incense.

settings.title: Tell your story
settings.content: Add your own custom content to give more information about your store, availability details...

settings.title: Sarah
settings.heading: Natural and made in France
settings.content: "Bloom's values on the manufacture of their incense sticks is what I liked from the start, a natural manufacture, 100% Made In France and with smells that are just crazy!"

settings.title: Marine
settings.heading: An essential!
settings.content: "Energetic sound therapist, it is essential for me to prepare my tools and my room before each session. Installing a climate of trust and well-being goes through the 5 senses and in particular through the olfactory, and through ethics as much as the energy released by these sticks, Bloom was obvious to me."

settings.title: Jordan
settings.heading: Joy of scents
settings.content: "A real headache to choose! The scents are all as pleasant as each other."

settings.title: Priscilla
settings.heading: A real reconciliation with incense!
settings.content: "Bloom incense reconciled me with stick incense, thanks to their impeccable composition, their manufacture in France and above all, their absolutely divine smells! I love using them to relax or concentrate when I work."

settings.title: Aur√©lie
settings.heading: Incense that does not stubborn... finally!
settings.content: "I have completely adopted Bloom incense, whether in my daily practice or to create a cozy atmosphere at home! What I appreciate is the richness of their scents, which are very present without taking the lead like this may be the case with other incense. And what a joy to know that they are made in the South-West!"

settings.title: Am√©lie
settings.heading: Little pleasure
settings.content: "Bloom incense is my little pleasure after a day cleaning: nothing better than the intoxicating smell of Bubble Shell to enjoy a moment of pure relaxation!"

settings.title: Nicholas
settings.heading: Perfume your interior in a flame!
settings.content: "The Bloom incense collection is a real pleasure, it's so pleasant to perfume your interior with a simple flame with natural ingredients"

settings.title: Dawn
settings.heading: Recharge at home
settings.content: "Bloom products, a must have for creating a haven of peace and recharging one's batteries... easily at home!"

settings.title: Am√©lie
settings.heading: Support the made in France!
settings.content: "I like to use Bloom incense during my Rituals, they smell good and cleanse energies. A little extra: It's important for me to support a French company with quality products."

settings.title: Alice
settings.heading: A real pleasure with each use
settings.content: ‚ÄúI have been using Bloom incense since my installation as a Naturopath. The olfactory benefits are incredible for my clients and for myself! A pleasure with each massage, meditation or consultation! ¬ª

settings.title: On ne trouvait pas d'encens sain et fait en France. Alors on a cr√©e le n√¥tre !
settings.content: Chez Bloom, tu trouveras des b√¢tons d'encens aux senteurs in√©dites et subtiles. Chaque encens est fabriqu√© √† partir de seulement 6 ingr√©dients 100% naturels : du bois, des fruits, des √©pices, des plantes, des fleurs... pas besoin de plus !

settings.title: Laisse entrer la lumi√®re et la magie avec nos suncatchers
